goal.en: Western philosophy of religion and religious studies have transited through the stages of traditional metaphysics and modern religious sciences, and have transferred from phenomenology of philosophy to the third stage: hermeneutics of religion. After an introductory presentation to traditional philosophy of religion and modern religious studies, this course will systemically reveal and develop the fundamental theories of hermeneutics, and through the introduction of relevant basic texts, initiate students into the palace of philosophy of religion and hermeneutics at the same time.
goal.ch: 西方宗教哲學及宗教研究經由傳統形上學及現代宗教學兩階段後已經由宗教現象學進入第三階段：宗教詮釋學。本課程在導論性地介紹傳統宗教哲學及現代宗教學後，將體系性地揭示與展開宗教詮釋學之基本理論，並且藉由相關基要文本之導讀，引介學子同時進入宗教哲學及詮釋學之殿堂。

content.en: This course will first introduce a new typology and development history of philosophy of religion in the West from paradigm of the traditional metaphysical philosophy of religion through the rise of paradigm of the modern religious sciences and its transformation to phenomenology of religion. Through the above, the third phase and paradigm can be initiated: hermeneutics of religion. Then, after essentially presenting the basic theories in the contemporary hermeneutic turn and its systemic meta-theory, it can also systemically induct the theoretical concepts and practical applications of hermeneutics of religion. In this part of the discourse, on the one hand, this course will use the reading of classic texts to orientate students enter the spiritual dimension of religion and the reflections about it, such as the ideas of religious belief objects and subjects, and on the other hand, the religious practice dimension involved in the systemic hermeneutics of religion, In the dimension, issues such as religious experience and ethics will be specifically discussed.
content.ch:
本課程首先將透過一種嶄新的宗教哲學類型學及發展史鋪陳地介紹西方從傳統形上學式宗教哲學典範經由現代宗教學典範之興起與其轉型至宗教現象學，而引進第三期典範：宗教詮釋學。接著在本質性地導論出當代詮釋學轉向中的基本理論以及其體系性後設理論後，進而能體系性地呈現宗教詮釋學基本構思及實際運用。在這部分的研討，本課程一方面會以經典文本之導讀使學子進入其宗教精神向度之省思如關於宗教信仰對象及主體等觀念，另方面會在體系性宗教詮釋學所涉及宗教實踐向度中具體討論如宗教經驗及倫理等議題。
1.宗教哲學導論I：基本問題
2.宗教哲學導論II：基本概念
3.西方宗教哲學生成發展史I:從傳統形上學至宗教科學
4.西方宗教哲學生成發展史II:從宗教現象學至宗教詮釋學
5. 體系性詮釋學導論I：從哲學詮釋學至體系性詮釋學
6. 體系性詮釋學導讀I：哲學詮釋學經典文本選讀
6. 體系性詮釋學導論II：基設，理論，模式
7. 體系性詮釋學導讀II：體系性詮釋學文本選讀
8. 宗教詮釋學導論I: 基本理論
9. 宗教詮釋學導讀I: 文本選讀
10. 宗教詮釋學導論II:基本範疇
11. 宗教詮釋學導讀II:文本選讀
12. 宗教詮釋學主題I：宗教信仰對象
13. 宗教詮釋學主題導讀I：文本選讀
14. 宗教詮釋學主題II：宗教信仰主體
15. 宗教詮釋學主題導讀II：文本選讀
16. 宗教詮釋學主題III：宗教經驗
17. 宗教詮釋學主題IV：宗教倫理
18. 開放性結論：體系性宗教詮釋學
